tool.name: pdftex
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the &pdftex; utility.
tool.sets: PDFTEX PDFTEXFLAGS PDFTEXCOM PDFLATEX PDFLATEXFLAGS PDFLATEXCOM LATEXRETRIES

cvar.name: PDFTEXCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to call the &pdftex; utility.

cvar.name: PDFTEXCOMSTR
cvar.summary:
The string displayed when calling the &pdftex; utility. If this is not set, then &cv-link-PDFTEXCOM; (the command line) is displayed.
env = Environment(PDFTEXCOMSTR = "Building $TARGET from TeX input $SOURCES")

cvar.name: PDFTEXFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the &pdftex; utility.
